1.0.name: wordpress/add-indent-blanks
1.0.description: This plugin give writers an option to automatically add spaces before paragraphs. It's mainly designed for Simplified Chinese users, because most of their paragraphs are indented by 4 spaces. In edit page, if paragraphs are not start with 4 spaces, the checkbox for auto adding spaces will show up. 在文章编辑页，当有段落段首不以4个空格开头时，侧栏会出现“自动补足段首空格”的选项。
